00048 #include "smartrf/CC1100/smartrf_CC1100.h"
00049 #elif (defined MRFI_CC1101)
00050 #include "smartrf/CC1101/smartrf_CC1101.h"
00051 #elif (defined MRFI_CC2500)
00052 #include "smartrf/CC2500/smartrf_CC2500.h"
00053 #elif (defined MRFI_CC1110)
00054 #include "smartrf/CC1110/smartrf_CC1110.h"
00055 #elif (defined MRFI_CC1111)
00056 #include "smartrf/CC1111/smartrf_CC1111.h"
00057 #elif (defined MRFI_CC2510)
00058 #include "smartrf/CC2510/smartrf_CC2510.h"
00059 #elif (defined MRFI_CC2511)
00060 #include "smartrf/CC2511/smartrf_CC2511.h"
00061 #elif (defined MRFI_CC1100E_470)
00062 #include "smartrf/CC1100E/470/smartrf_CC1100E.h"
00063 #elif (defined MRFI_CC1100E_950)
00064 #include "smartrf/CC1100E/950/smartrf_CC1100E.h"
00065 #else
00066 #error "ERROR: A valid radio is not specified."
00067 #endif
